Constants for the Package MDBApi

Constant Summary
BASIC_ACCESSMinimum access - only the most basic stuff
FULL_ACCESSFull access - all that's possible
MEDIUM_ACCESSModerate access - some more than just the minimum
NO_ACCESSNo access at all
PILOT_IMDBFALLBACKEnable IMDB-Fallback for non-IMDB classes?

Constant Detail

BASIC_ACCESS

integer $BASIC_ACCESS

Minimum access - only the most basic stuff

FULL_ACCESS

integer $FULL_ACCESS

Full access - all that's possible

MEDIUM_ACCESS

integer $MEDIUM_ACCESS

Moderate access - some more than just the minimum

NO_ACCESS

integer $NO_ACCESS

No access at all

PILOT_IMDBFALLBACK

boolean $PILOT_IMDBFALLBACK

Enable IMDB-Fallback for non-IMDB classes? If this is not set to TRUE, changing of the pilot_imdbfill setting will have no effect, it will always be set to NO_ACCESS. The imdb classes will be included based on this setting.

See also:
mdb_config::pilot_imdbfill
